Sure, Here are some suggestions for how to meet new positive people:

1. Attend Positive Community Events: Attend community events like workshops, classes, or meetings that focus on topics that you're interested in. This could be wellness, meditation, spirituality, or personal growth. These events provide an opportunity to meet people who share your interests and values.

2. Join Clubs or Groups: Join groups or clubs that cater to your interests such as book clubs, nature groups, or sports clubs. Meetup.com is a great platform to explore groups and clubs around your location and interests.

3. Volunteer: Volunteering is a great way to meet new people who share a passion for helping others. Sign up to volunteer with a local charity or non-profit organization, and you will meet like-minded people while making a positive impact.

4. Take a Class: Take a class or workshop that interests you. This could be cooking, dancing, or art. Enrolling in these classes can provide an excellent opportunity to meet new people, learn a new skill, and have fun.

5. Attend Networking Events: Attend networking events in your professional field or industry. These events can provide you with an opportunity to meet new people, build connections, and explore new opportunities.

Remember, meeting new people takes time and effort. Be patient, open-minded, and proactive in your search. It's important to remember that quality is better than quantity when it comes to friendship, so focus on building meaningful relationships with those who share your values and vision.
